org.cpp4j.java
Class IntArray

java.lang.Object
  org.cpp4j.java.IntArray

public class IntArray
extends java.lang.Object

Class to simulate pointer operations on integer arrays.

Author:
Tilmann Zaeschke

Constructor Summary

IntArray(int[] array)
          Create a new DoubleArray referencing the given int array.

          Create a new DoubleArray referencing the given int array.
IntArray(IntArray array)
          Create a new DoubleArray referencing the same DoubleArray referenced by the argument.
IntArray(IntArray array, int ofs)
          Create a new DoubleArray referencing the same DoubleArray referenced by the argument, starting at the given offset.
